summary: Archery Related mod - Animation and SFX
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/images/5925-1-1326697378.jpg[/img]
[size=5][color=Mediumspringgreen]DESCRIPTION[/color][/size]
Currently in [color=Orangered]BETA[/color]

Replaces vanilla bow forward running animation and bow sound effects. 
WIP - Arrow impact SFX (on wood, metal, and dirt)


[size=3][color=Yellow]Updates[/color][/size]

[color=orange][Sunday, 15 January 10:09:57 p.m. (GMT - 8:00)][/color]
- Uploaded Beta 0.2, added a new SFX file
- New video for preview
- For those looking for the armors I use, http://modgames.net/load/249-2-0-8471
However, the file is currently unavailable. Keep checking it out,

[color=orange][Thursday, 12 January - 2:17:51 a.m (GMT - 8:00)][/color]
Thanks for the feedback! Here\'s an update. For those asking about the Armor, I will be posting the link when I get back to my MAIN pc. I got exams to study. I will not say the name of the author, and for those who know it, don\'t say it so that the author wont be flooded with hundred of pm\'s asking about the armor pack. :)

- Seperated files for those who use NMM
- Will be tweaking SFX and also adding a [color=Goldenrod]NEW[/color] one.

===
[size=5][color=Red]RECOMMENDED mods[/color][/size]

1. [url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5164]Proper Length Arrows by Madcat221[/url]
2. [url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1009]Faster Arrows by Fordperfect[/url] - Use Option Faster arrows by either 75% or 100%



[color=Mediumspringgreen]My Other mods[/color]

- [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6270]Alternative Nord Battlecry[/url]
- [url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4700]Alternative Shouts for Males[/url]
- [url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4647]Shout the language of the Dragons [/url]




[color=Mediumspringgreen]INSTALL/UNINSTALL[/color]

Readme in the download file
author: TheFPSmachine
